name: DeLight (itch)
description:
DeLight is a game where you are trapped inside a maze. Everything around you is dark and filled with fog. You can barely see and have to use the only tool you have, a light source, to navigate through the maze. But beware, the more you brighten your light the more monsters will find their way towards you. Either go safe and dim or run fast and bright.

Controls
MouseControllerWalkLeft button
Left stick RunRight button
L3/ADim lightWheelLeft triggerBrighten lightWheel
Right trigger

Unfortunately controller input only works in standalone builds due to an error in unity webgl builds.
